resources.string: 1. In what country was Hugo Weaving, the actor who portrayed Lord Elrond born?
2. Who did Smeagol aka Gollum kill to possess the One Ring? Deagol or Feagol
3. Which two hobbits did Frodo and Sam meet while leaving The Shire and who joined them in their quest.
4. The author that wrote the Lord of the Rings books was named Prof. J.R.R. ____________?
5 Which actor portrayed the character, Samwise Gamgee in the movies?
6. Before the Orcs came into being, what kind of creatures where they? Men, Elves or Dwarves?
7. What towers where being referred to in the book title, "The Two Towers"?
8. How do members of the Proudfoot family prefer to be called when more than one of them is present? Proudfoots or Proudfeet?
9. Who rides upon the horse, Shadowfax?
10. What was the name of the younger brother of Boromir of Gondor?
